root.message: The COMPILING_ORG field for indicator 1-4-1, translated into en
root.data: National statistical offices and relevant ministries lead the compilation and reporting at a national level with support from custodian agencies. Global and regional reporting is led by UN-Habitat. The collection of the data is supported by collaborative efforts of several international institutions (UN-Habitat, WHO/UNICEF Joint Monitoring Programme for Water Supply, Sanitation and Hygiene (JMP),UNEP, World Bank, AfDB, IDB, EBRD and ADB) and bilateral donors (JICA, GIZ, etc.).
